rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a vestibule area, built according to Vastu norms ensuring positive energy flow. The door is oriented east for optimal light.

rooms.name: Open Living & Kitchen
rooms.description: Spacious open-plan area combining living, dining, and kitchen spaces with modern design elements. The layout ensures a clear view towards the east for sunrise, promoting balance.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A dedicated home theater area with integrated soundproofing and ambient lighting. Positioned in the southern part of the apartment to adhere to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet, designed to be located in the northwest corner of the apartment, aligning with Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Work Studio
rooms.description: A dedicated work studio area integrated into the living space, offering ample natural light and privacy, following modern design principles.
